column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Malnati's is only the second deep dish we've had in Chicago
column3: after our visit to the Wells St location
column4: we see no need to go anywhere else. We chose to sit at the bar instead of waiting for a table
column5: and the bartender was very attentive. My wife had not been a fan of deep dish
column6: but that quickly changed after we had "The Lou" specialty pizza with pepperoni. Just the right balance of cheese
column10: not too thick. A small was enough for both of us. Just right. We will be back!
